decision_conditions: Insufficient information has been submitted for Conditions 3 (Materials). The applicant has not demonstrated that the development would achieve a satisfactory appearance on completion. The proposal would not comply with Policy DM10 (Design Requirements for New Developments including House Extensions) of the LDF Core Strategy Adopted April 2012.

Insufficient information has been submitted for Conditions 7 (Landscaping and Planting). The applicant has not demonstrated that the development would be in the interest of visual amenity. The proposal would not comply with Policy DM10 (Design Requirements for New Developments including House Extensions) of the LDF Core Strategy Adopted April 2012.

Insufficient information has been submitted for Conditions 8 (Details). The applicant has not demonstrated that the development would successfully safeguard the amenities of the surrounding residential occupiers. Therefore in conflict with Policy DM10 (Design Requirements for New Developments including House Extensions) of the LDF Core Strategy Adopted April 2012.

Insufficient information has been submitted for Conditions 10 (Cycle Facilities). The applicant has not demonstrated that the development would be carried out in the interest of highway safety. Therefore in conflict with Policy DM8 (Sustainable Transport for New Development) of the LDF Core Strategy Adopted April 2012.
application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
description: Details required for Conditions 3 (Materials), 4 (Detailed Drawings) ,7 (Landscaping and Planting), 8 (Details) ,9 (Refuse and Recycling), 10 (Cycle Facilities),12 (Sound Testing) ,13 (Environmental Construction Management Plan),14 (Contaminated Land Assessment) of planning permission 17/14193/FUL (Change of use of site from car sales to residential use. Erection of part single/ part two/ part three storey building for use as nine self-contained flats with roof terraces/ amenity space and cycle parking provision)
